readme:
# monochrome-syntax theme

A Dark Monochrome syntax theme for Atom.
forked from the One Dark syntax theme (May 2017)
(and recommended for use with the One Dark ui theme)

Has a turquoise tint as is. but that can be easily changed with the \@syntax-hue variable in line 3 of styles/colors.less

![A screenshot of the theme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IbisLiven/monochrome-syntax/master/ScreenShot.png)
Font Used in picture is oxygen mono
